scenario_text.value: Okay everyone, have you rested up enough?
Absolutely!
Never felt better!
I’m ready to go anytime!

Then we’ll head off, but before that, let’s
review our goals.

We’re heading to the third shrine: the shrine
of the east.
And which way is east, exactly?
I know! That’s the way the sun rises!
...And you know the direction that is?
Nope!
Well that’s a big help...
Well, if the last shrine was to the north...

Then that area near the waterway is a good
bet. Right?
Yes, exactly!

Speaking of which, I did feel a strong
presence somewhere in there...

Yeah, it reminds me of the Sovereign Monster
I felt at the last shrine.

That’s some valuable information. Thank you,
Renamon.
Now then, we’ll head to the eastern shrine...
(We’ll find the Sovereign Monster and...)
Ask for help.
Fight and defeat him.
Clear away the fog.
Ask for help.
Let’s ask him to help us.
Yes, let’s do just that!

I hope we can actually talk things out this
time, but...

Yeah, I’ve already given up on expecting
anything. He’ll just wanna test us anyway.

If we head there with that in mind, it should
all work out.
Fight and defeat him.
We’ll fight him, and defeat him.

Hmm... Well, events will likely unfold that
way. Still...
Works for me. That’ll make things quicker.

Haha, yeah, exactly! We just gotta beat him
down to get his power. Easy-peasy!

Um, you know we’re trying to save the world
here, right? Not going to pick a fight.
Yeah, pump the brakes, you two!
Clear away the fog.
Let’s clear away the fog.

Yes, that should remove one of the Master’s
threats!

I like the sound of that. As soon as we leave
the shrine, it’ll be blue skies ahead!
Yeah! Soaking in the sunlight feels amazing!

Let’s give those kids living in fear of the
fog and Kenzoku a sense of relief.
Those are all of our goals! Any questions?

The goals are good and all that, but we
should take a break in a safe place.

Yeah, I hear you. I wanna head back to the
school now.

It’s in the same direction. Let’s head back
after we find the next Sovereign Monster.
Great, we can finally sleep under a roof!
I wanna take a bath!
I wanna eat some of Aoi’s food!

Oh yeah, it sure is tasty. Makes me wanna
take a nap...
Right?! That’s our honorary mama for you!

Ah, shoot... Just thinking about her food’s
got my stomach growling...
Ahaha! The heck, Minoru!
Ahaha! I can hear it from here!

Amazing. Just talking about the school
brought smiles to everyone’s faces.

That just goes to show the sense of security
the school brings us.

Saying that school is a home to us isn’t an
exaggeration.
Yup. Let’s head back as soon as we can.
You’re right.
Okay, you guys, time to head to the waterway!
